cloudwatchLogs.description: A block that specifies configures sending Verified Access logs to CloudWatch Logs. Detailed below.

includeTrustContext.description: Include trust data sent by trust providers into the logs.

kinesisDataFirehose.description: A block that specifies configures sending Verified Access logs to Kinesis. Detailed below.

logVersion.description: The logging version to use. Refer to [VerifiedAccessLogOptions](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AWSEC2/latest/APIReference/API_VerifiedAccessLogOptions.html) for the allowed values.

s3.description: A block that specifies configures sending Verified Access logs to S3. Detailed below.
